extendedInfo.description: Now FREE!!!!!!!Personal Finance Pro is a small application help every body tracking daily payments. It help you manage money contains: Cash, Bank Account. It like a personal accountant. It also be bundled with some useful calculating tools and a currency converter.VERSION 4.0 RELEASED!!!!!!!V4.0: - Cloud synchronizing available (Dropbox service) - Support large screens (HTC EVO3D)V3.5 - ADD NEW TOOLS: Currency converter, Bank LOAN/Saving calculators - Fix bugsV3.2- Fix some force close errors when open payment info form (very sorry for this inconvenience!)- Fix bugs after changing currency localeChanges note:- COMPLETELY NEW CLEAN AND PRO UI- New setting form, new configuration parameters  + Monthly quotat,  + Text color indicator,  + Currency select  + reset database- New payment information forms& features + Summary form, + Summary chart for daily and monthly payments,- And fix another little problem about program performance speed, bugs.PLEASE VOTE IF YOU LIKE, THAT HELP "PERSONAL FINANCE" COME WITH MORE AND MORE NICE PEOPLE LIKE YOU!send an email to support@songhongonline.com if you have any comment.Version 2.0- All new clean interface,- Fix important bug- Add category payment calculation,- Add payment chart.*) Note: PRO version NOT use same database with LITE version

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Would rate better if it had a few more functions but it\'s what I was looking for.
reviews.author: A Google User
